onset.Description: Onset time of event in seconds

duration.Description: Duration time of event in seconds

Levels.relation_prompt: Prompt presented to indicate an upcoming relation block
Levels.relation_blank: Blank screen period during the relation task (isi)
Levels.relation_block: Full block representing the relation component from first trial to last trial of block
Levels.control_prompt: Prompt presented to indicate an upcoming control task
Levels.control_blank: Blank screen period during the control task (isi)
Levels.control_block: Full block representing the control component from first trial to last trial of block

stim_type.Description: Type of stimulus shown to participant during stim trials

response_time.Description: Time taken by participant to respond, in milliseconds

block.Description: Identifies the specific task block in which the trial appears

accuracy.Description: Participantâ€™s response accuracy for the trial (block is full block accuary), stim is trial accuracy

response.Description: Response type provided by the participant
